Overview For ghostGLSyncCamera Members Chapter

getPhantomNode

gstPHANToM* getPhantomNode( ) ;

Returns the gstPHANToM instance associated with the glManager.

setViewParameters

virtual float setViewParameters( ) ;

Method used for the SyncToWindow option.

syncCameraToWorkspace

virtual void syncCameraToWorkspace( ) ;

Method used for SYNC_WORKSPACE_TO_CAMERA.

syncWorkspaceToCamera

virtual void syncWorkspaceToCamera( ) ;

This sync method is used by the SYNC_WORKSPACE_TO_CAMERA mode. It uses the current workspace offset setting to pretranslate the PHANToM's base relative to the camera transform. The main utility of this sync method is that it ensures the haptics are aligned with the camera view (i.e. What you see is what you feel).

syncWorkspaceToWindow

virtual void syncWorkspaceToWindow( ) ;

Method used for SYNC_CAMERA_TO_WORKSPACE.
